scripts.build: npm run delete:target && npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run test:coverage
scripts.copy: cp package.json target/out/package.json && cp README.md target/out/README.md && cp LICENCE target/out/LICENCE
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run copy && npm publish target/out
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm run copy && npm publish target/out
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm run copy && npm publish target/out
